title: the best
review: spoiler One of my all time favorites. Shawshank Redemption is a very moving story about hope and the power of friendship. . If you have not seen this movie rent it or better yet buy it. As I bet you'll want to see this one more than once. who can ever forget the scene under rain giving freedom a big big hug :)
